request.description: Get details of a specific product

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "product": {
    "_id": "P1",
    "name": "iPhone 13",
    "price": 999,
    "stock": 24,
    "sold": 42,
    "image": "https://via.placeholder.com/50",
    "supportImages": [
      "https://via.placeholder.com/300/1",
      "https://via.placeholder.com/300/2",
      "https://via.placeholder.com/300/3"
    ],
    "category": "Smartphones",
    "status": "Active",
    "description": "Latest iPhone model with A15 Bionic chip",
    "specifications": {
      "processor": "A15 Bionic",
      "storage": "128GB",
      "display": "6.1-inch Super Retina XDR",
      "camera": "Dual 12MP camera system",
      "battery": "Up to 19 hours video playback"
    },
    "createdAt": "2025-05-15",
    "updatedAt": "2025-06-20"
  }
}
